definition: refrain (from doing sth)/(coll.) Come on!/Give me a break!/Save it!
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Phoebe: Come on, like you never talk that.
sentences.chinese: 少来了，你们从未谈论过。

sentences.english: Not now, I'm sick. - Oh, come on, you big faker !
sentences.chinese: 现在不行，我病了少来了，大骗子。

sentences.english: Come on. Here is for enjoying and exciting.
sentences.chinese: 少来，这里是来开心和刺激的。

sentences.english: Chuck: No, this is my game. I pick the players.
sentences.chinese: 少来，这是我搞的比赛，由我来挑选参赛人员。

sentences.english: I thinking about you , oh , come on.
Ah, Come on, clowfish. Do something funny.
sentences.chinese: 少来了，小丑，对，来一点有趣的。

sentences.english: Come on, it's a joke, Carrie.
sentences.chinese: 少来了，我在开玩笑，凯莉。

definition: in your dreams!/as if!/You wish!/I wish that were so
contraction of 不用[bu4 yong4]/need not/please don't
to talk drivel/to assert sth without a proper understanding or basis in fact/not to know what one is talking about
my old mother/I, this old woman/my old lady (colloquial)/maternal grandmother/midwife
no ivory comes from the mouth of a dog (idiom)/no good words are to be expected from a scoundrel
pinyin: gou3 zui3 li5 tu3 bu4 chu1 xiang4 ya2
